transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan, hello. Good morning sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Yes sir, actually aapne kal baat nahi ki thi, aapne bola tha ki aaj aap karenge.
Customer: Thoda mein bahar mein hu, mein aake woh baat karta hu kal parso.
Executive: Accha, kis time pe?
Customer: Thoda bahar country mein hu.
Executive: Ek minute, toh kya keh rahe ho aap?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Mein bahar country mein hu. Bahar country mein hu.
Customer: Monday aayega.
Customer: Monday. Kab tak baat ho jayegi?
Customer: Monday, Monday.
Executive: Monday ko baat ho jayegi?
Customer: Monday, Monday, Monday.
Executive: Okay. Jo aapka secondary number hai, woh koi dekhta hai kya?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer will call after coming back from out of country.

- Wants to know if secondary number is visible.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to call on Monday.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, secondary number, out of country
